userEmailBox==//input[@id='identifierId']
signInText==//span[contains(text(),'Sign in')]
nextButtonAfterEmail==//span[@class = 'RveJvd snByac']
userPasswordBox==//input[@name = 'password']
nextButtonAfterPasswd==#passwordNext > span > span
composeEmail==//div[@class = 'z0']
recipientEmail==//textarea[@id = ':r7']
subjectlineOfEmail==//input[@id = ':qp']
bodyOfEmail==//div[@id = ':ru']
sendButton==//div[@id = ':qf']
inboxTableFirstElelemnt==//tr[@id=\":v2\"]
subjectheaderLocator==//h2[contains(text(),'This is your subject')]
